message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this item for sale at $130. I think you'll find it's a great deal at this price.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate your item, but I believe I can find a better deal elsewhere. I am willing to pay up to $100 for the product.
Thanks for your offer, Bob. I understand you're looking for the best deal. While I can't go as low as $100, I'm willing to come down to $115. This offer reflects the true value of the product.
Hello Alice, thank you for adjusting your offer. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Based on my research and budget, I am comfortable to pay up to $110 for the product.
